Donald Rumsfeld wrote that he never authorized waterboarding-- simulated drowning-- but he also called CIA interrogators who used the interrogation technique`` patriots, not criminals.'' The questioning of those in department of defence custody provided information that saved innocent American lives. I make no apology for that, he also wrote. Donald Rumsfeld , 78, served as defence secretary in two separate Republican administrations, becoming both the youngest and oldest man to hold the job.
